meanings.definition: A plant with stinging hairs that cause a painful sensation when touched.
meanings.sent1: The nettles in the garden made me itchy.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to touch the nettles while hiking.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played with the nettles and regretted it.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like nettles, pricking at his emotions.
meanings.sent5: The nettles glowed in the sunlight, warning of their sting.

meanings.sent1: His constant teasing nettles his little sister.
meanings.sent2: The loud music next door nettles me when I'm trying to study.
meanings.sent3: The persistent fly nettles the sleeping dog.
meanings.sent4: The repetitive sound of the dripping tap nettles her nerves.
meanings.sent5: The way he chews his food loudly nettles everyone at the table.
